com.cambiumnetworks.wa.services.policies
Interface PolicyInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
DatabaseCleanupPolicy, StaleDataCleanupPolicy
public interface PolicyInterface

Interface used by the Policies Service to execute scheduled policies. Your logic for a policy must implement this class. In policies database table, set the full class path of your class implementing PolicyInterface as the policy_class column.

Author:
FRMQ36 Revision history ------------------------------------------------------------ $Log: PolicyInterface.java,v $ Revision 1.1 2011/12/20 21:25:58 jordan issue #17404 Implement Policies Service

Method Summary
 void execute()
          Is called by the Policies Service when corresponding database entry is scheduled to run.
 

Method Detail

execute

void execute()
Is called by the Policies Service when corresponding database entry is scheduled to run. Contains all logic required by policy.
